channel.title: Defenders?

item.title: Defenders?
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

[quote=“p k j00, post:3, topic:104447”]Thank you but

this is my code

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 && playerEquipment[playerShield] == 1215) // dragon scim { return 1658; else return 2068; }

and this is the error

[quote]client.java:22402: ‘else’ without ‘if’
else if;
^
1 error
Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:666
[/quote][/quote]

Replace the code with

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 && playerEquipment[playerShield] == 1215) // dragon scim
{
return 1658;
}
else
{
return 2068;
}

Read full topic

item.description:
@p_k_j00 wrote:

Thank you but

this is my code

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 && playerEquipment[playerShield] == 1215) // dragon scim { return 1658; else return 2068; }

and this is the error

client.java:22402: 'else' without 'if' else if; ^ 1 error Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:666

item.title: Defenders?
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

[quote=“p k j00, post:1, topic:104447”][shadow=red,left][size=18pt]Making defenders attack?[/size][/shadow]

Well, I have just made my defender. Then i thought umm i wunder if it can attck.

If u look at the torag hammers emote it looks like you hit twice. So i woundered if something like this would work:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587)& if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == 1215) // dragon scim
{
return 1658;
}
else
}
return 2068;
}
}

This does not work… Perhaps my coding is not right (Probably)

However what do you think? I think its a good idea. =]

Thnx
~P K J00[/quote]

That’s not right.

This line > if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587)& if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == 1215) // dragon scim

Is supposed to be if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 && playerEquipment[playerShield] == 1215) // dragon scim

Read full topic

item.title: Defenders?
item.dc:creator: @p_k_j00 p k j00
item.description:
@p_k_j00 wrote:

[shadow=red,left][size=18pt]Making defenders attack?[/size][/shadow]

Well, I have just made my defender. Then i thought umm i wunder if it can attck.

If u look at the torag hammers emote it looks like you hit twice. So i woundered if something like this would work:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587)& if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == 1215) // dragon scim
{
return 1658;
}
else
}
return 2068;
}
}

This does not work… Perhaps my coding is not right (Probably)

However what do you think? I think its a good idea. =]

Thnx
~P K J00
